inputs.name: ConnectedServiceNameARM
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager connection to use when authenticating to Azure

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group where the Event Grid is located
inputs.helpMarkDown: The resource group in which the Event Grid Topic account is.

inputs.name: eventGridTopicName
inputs.label: Event Grid Topic
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Event Grid Topic name to add the subscription to.

inputs.name: eventSubscriptionName
inputs.label: Subscription name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the event grid subscription.

inputs.name: deadLetterEvents
inputs.label: Event dead-lettering enabled
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, event grid dead-lettering will be enabled. You must also configure the storage account and container name.

inputs.name: deadLetterStorageAccountName
inputs.label: Storage account for dead-lettered events
inputs.helpMarkDown: If event dead-lettering is enabled, use this storage account to store them.

inputs.name: deadLetterBlobContainerName
inputs.label: Blob container for dead-lettered events
inputs.helpMarkDown: If event dead-lettering is enabled, use this blob container to store them.

inputs.name: eventTtl
inputs.label: Event time to live
inputs.helpMarkDown: TTL in minutes for events. Must be between 1 and 1440.

inputs.name: maxDeliveryAttempt
inputs.label: Maximum delivery attempts
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum number of attempts to deliver an event. Must be between 1 and 30.

inputs.name: includedEventType
inputs.label: Included event types
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the event types to send events for. All event types will be sent if empty.
